answers.answer: Have you seen a neurologist for an evaluation? do you have a history of diabetes? Are you on any meds?

What other tests have been done by the doctor?  Have they checked you for diabetes?  Did they just send you on your way with a walking stick?  If so, then you need to find a new doctor.  Seriously, this is not something you should have to live with without a diagnosis.

question: cant drive cos can't feel the pedals. my feet can feel anything that pricks but just not sensitive enough to have any feelings.. whethe my sandals is on or off. or can hardly feel the floor when i walk.. This caused me to crumble and fall as i walk. Now i am walking with the aid of a walking stick for support.  Been for MRI & CT scan but found no traces of any abnormalities.wonder what else can i do to restore the strength to my legs???
title: No feelings on feet
